{{Wireless embedded system |brand=SerComm |model=RC8221 |revision= |upc= |ean= |asin=B00BTEY95S |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=02/21/2011 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=Yes |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability=OEM |type=camera |fcc_id=P27-RC8221 |ic_id= |us_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Texas Instruments |cpu1_model=DM365ZCE30 |cpu1_cspeed= |fla1=16 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX25L12845EMI-10G |fla1_num= |ram1=128 |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_model=NT5TU64M16GG-AC |ram1_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_chip1_brand=Ralink |wi1_chip1_model=RT3072L |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Realtek |eth_chip2_model=RTL8201EL |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports= |addl_chips= |flags= |stock_os= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui= |oui_eth= }} {{TagLine|Compact HD (11N) Wireless Network Camera}} :''Wireless Digital HD 720p IP Security Video Camera''
[http://www.sercomm.com/contpage.aspx?langid=1&type=prod3&L1id=2&L2id=3&L3id=9&Prodid=99 Product page]
"YWT00D-1.6" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos.
The power supply shown in the FCC photos is a '''Sunny''' :SYS1381-1212-W2 (100-240VAC ~ 50-60Hz, 0.5A -> 12VDC, 1.0A).
